name: OneMoreDrop
description:
One more drop is an arcade game made in 72 hours for the #LD44 game jam
The theme of the Jam is: Your life Is currency.
And we tried to build something in that short amount of time!

The game is made by:

ZAX
A_ColtZz

Don't forget to check out the Youtube channel of ZAX for behind of scenes video :
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGdFkzz7xOZTxPiVyd2MLZQ

thanks for playing !!
